atbat.des: Umpire reviewed (home-plate collision), call on the field was overturned: Albert Pujols singles on a ground ball to center fielder Leonys Martin. Kole Calhoun scores. Albert Pujols to 2nd on the throw. Missed catch error by catcher Chris Gimenez, assist to center fielder Leonys Martin to pitcher Yu Darvish.
atbat.des_es: null Albert Pujols pega sencillo con rodado a jardinero central Leonys Martin. Kole Calhoun anota Albert Pujols a 2da con el tiro. Error con batazo dejado caer de receptor Chris Gimenez, asistencia de jardinero central Leonys Martin a lanzador Yu Darvish.
